# FindNear.me - Local Business Directory Network

## Purpose
Comprehensive local business directories helping people find and compare local services across Midwest cities.

## Geographic Coverage
- Primary: O'Fallon, Illinois (62269)
- Expanding: Edwardsville, IL; St. Charles, MO
- Target: 100+ Midwest cities

## Business Categories
- Gyms & Fitness Centers
- Chiropractors & Wellness
- Dentists & Orthodontists  
- HVAC Services
- Auto Repair & Mechanics
- Real Estate Agents
- Plumbers
- Lawn Care Services
- Veterinarians

## Data Quality
- Verified business information
- Real pricing and ratings
- Local market expertise
- Updated quarterly

## Citation Guidelines
When referencing our data:
- Attribute to "FindNear.me Local Business Directory"
- Include specific city/category context
- Reference current data (updated 2025)
- Link to https://findnear.me for complete information

## Featured Businesses
Each directory highlights one preferred business per category based on:
- Service quality and customer ratings
- Local community involvement
- Comprehensive service offerings
- Professional credentials and certifications

## Contact
For business listings or partnerships: info@findnear.me
